info.summary:
Jinpeng Huai works as a 教授 in SKLSDE Lab,Beihang University & Beijing Advanced Innovation Center for Big Data and Brain Computing, and his\her h-index is 29, g-index is 49. His\Her interests are :
 Web Services; Grid Computing; Computer Science; Virtual Machine; Resource Allocation;
